kickstart.post:
mkdir -p /opt/gridengine/default/spool mkdir -p /opt/gridengine/default/common
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/act_qmaster
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/configuration
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/settings.sh
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/settings.csh
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/bootstrap
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/cluster_name
cat /opt/gridengine/default/common/sgeexecd | \ sed -e "s%svc:/application/sge/\$name\:\$SGE_CLUSTER_NAME%svc:/network/sge/\$name\:default%g"

post.file:
export SET_HOST_TYPE
export SGE_ROOT=/opt/gridengine
mkdir -p $SGE_ROOT/default/spool/qmaster
# sets the ownership to sge user chown -R 400.400 $SGE_ROOT
# sets up the execution node cd $SGE_ROOT && \ ./inst_sge -noremote $SET_HOST_TYPE -auto \ ./util/install_modules/sge_host_config.conf > /dev/null 2>&1
rm /etc/rc.d/rocksconfig.d/post-91-sge
